PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08902021-08-14,  ,  ,  AAFC,  , 
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectOrder providing Financial Assistance under the Federal-provincial-territorial AgriRecovery Framework to Ontario, Manitoba, Saskatchewan, Alberta and British Columbia livestock and agricultural producers
PrecisOrder authorizing Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to enter into the AGREEMENTS with the provinces of Ontario, Manitoba, Saskatchewan, Alberta and British Columbia to provide federal contributions of up to $400 million under the AGRICULTURAL DISASTER RELIEF PROGRAM (AgriRecovery) to assist with the extraordinary costs of livestock producers impacted by the drought and the agricultural producers impacted by wildfires in 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
